participant_1.background:
I was a good son, but we grew apart when I chose to follow my passion.
I fear the day I will have to leave my room and interact with other people.
I love to cook and try new recipes, but my favorite place to eat is at my family's house.
my husband is a lawyer.
I like to listen to music while I work out to help me push myself.

participant_2.background:
I now have more time to play music and tend to my garden.
I enjoy spending my free time cosplaying with my husband.
I'm not sure what a fortune teller could tell me, but I'm sure they'd be impressed by my talents and my love for my family.
my dad died when i was in high school.
I'm passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games and spend time with my dogs.
Nice, what games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorites are RPGs and strategy games.
I like to play RPGs too! What are some of your favorites?
I like the Elder Scrolls series, the Fallout series, and the Witcher series.
Those are all great games! I've played all of them except for the Witcher series.
You should definitely check out the Witcher series. It's one of the best RPGs out there.
I'll have to check it out. What's your favorite thing about the game?
I love the story and the characters. The world is also really immersive and detailed.
I've heard good things about the story. I'm excited to try it out.
You won't be disappointed!
What do you like to do for fun besides play video games?
I like to spend time with my family, cook, and tend to my garden.
That sounds really nice. I love to cook too.
Me too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. I'm not very good at making desserts, though.
I love pasta too! I'm not very good at making desserts either.
It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
I agree! It's been nice talking to you.
You too. Maybe we can play some video games together sometime.
That would be fun
